element.text: 表格内部合并:span-method='arraySpanMethod'arraySpanMethod({ rowIndex, columnIndex }) {//19列 if (rowIndex === 0){ if (columnIndex === 19) { return [6, 1]; } else if (columnIndex === 20) { return [6, 1]; } else { return [1,1]; } }`

表格不换行：render-header='labelHead'=》 labelHead:function(h, { column }) { labelHead: function(h, { column }) { let l = column.label.length; let f = 15; column.minWidth = f * (l + 2); //加上一个文字长度 return h('div', { class: 'table-head', style: { width: '100%' } }, [ column.label ]); }, },
清除浮动的方法:父元素添加overflow:hidden,after为元素.claefix:afer{},content:'',display:'block',clear:'both',visibility:'hidden',.clearfix{*zoom:1;}
占位位与不占位:display:nine;不占位隐藏  visibility:hidden;占位隐藏
背景占满整个屏幕: background:url('../../src/assets/bgg.png'), width:100%,height:100%;overflow: hidden;background-size:100%100%; position:fixed;
小手样式及字体间距: cursor:pointer; letter-spacing:10px;
